bug.author: fepegar
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>(N:\Development\myenv) C:\Users\rmapfpe>pip install torchio Collecting torchio Downloading torchio-0.17.51-py2.py3-none-any.whl (111 kB) |████████████████████████████████| 111 kB 6.4 MB/s Collecting tqdm Downloading tqdm-4.51.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl (70 kB) |████████████████████████████████| 70 kB 4.8 MB/s Collecting Python-Deprecated Downloading Python-Deprecated-1.1.0.tar.gz (2.9 kB) Collecting scipy Downloading scipy-1.5.3-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl (31.2 MB) |████████████████████████████████| 31.2 MB 6.4 MB/s Collecting SimpleITK<2 Downloading SimpleITK-1.2.4-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl (28.0 MB) |████████████████████████████████| 28.0 MB 6.8 MB/s Collecting nibabel Downloading nibabel-3.2.0-py3-none-any.whl (3.3 MB) |████████████████████████████████| 3.3 MB ... Collecting torchvision Downloading torchvision-0.5.0-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl (1.2 MB) |████████████████████████████████| 1.2 MB ... Collecting humanize Downloading humanize-3.1.0-py3-none-any.whl (69 kB) |████████████████████████████████| 69 kB 4.0 MB/s ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement torch>=1.1 (from torchio) (from versions: 0.1.2, 0.1.2.post1, 0.1.2.post2) ERROR: No matching distribution found for torch>=1.1 (from torchio) </denchmark-code>
This error doesn't happen if PyTorch is installed with conda before running pip install torchio.
